# Problem 1
```{r}
nyc_subway = 
  read_csv(
    "data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv",
    col_types = cols(Route8 = "c", Route9 = "c", Route10 = "c", Route11 = "c")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(
    line, station_name, station_latitude, station_longitude, 
    starts_with("route"), entry, exit_only, vending, entrance_type, 
    ada) %>% 
  mutate(entry = ifelse(entry == "YES", TRUE, FALSE))

nyc_subway %>% 
  select(station_name, line) %>% 
  distinct
## 465 distinct stations

nyc_subway %>% 
  filter(ada == TRUE) %>% 
  select(station_name, line) %>% 
  distinct
## 84 stations

nyc_subway %>% 
  filter(vending == "NO") %>% 
  pull(entry) %>% 
  mean
## 37.8% 

nyc_subway %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    route1:route11,
    names_to = "route_num",
    values_to = "route") %>% 
  filter(route == "A") %>% 
  select(station_name, line) %>% 
  distinct
## 60 stations

nyc_subway %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    route1:route11,
    names_to = "route_num",
    values_to = "route") %>% 
  filter(route == "A", ada == TRUE) %>% 
  select(station_name, line) %>% 
  distinct
## 17 stations

```
